Posts.Content: Please keep us updated!!! We will all be praying for you!!!
Posts.Title: Lump in breast for three years

Posts.Content:
Hi
I felt a small mass in my right breast a couple weeks before Christmas and I just recently had a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound on both breast. The mass was not seen on either, but the doctors are now referring me to a surgeon because the mass is still there and is very feel-able. It is about
 the size of a dime/nickel... 
Has anyone ever been diagnosed with BC and the lump/mass not show on the tests?
Posts.Title: In need of support
